job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: strongEmployee Applicant Privacy NoticebrbrstrongstronguWho We ArebrbrustrongWelcoming collaborative and having the opportunity to make an impact  is how our employees describe working here Galileo is a financial technology company that provides innovative and revolutionary software products and services that power some of the worlds largest Fintechs We are the only payments innovator that applies tech and engineering capabilities to empower Fintechs and financial institutions to unleash their full creativity to achieve their most inspired goals Galileo leads its industry with superior fraud detection security decisionmaking analytics and regulatory compliance functionality combined with customized responsive and flexible programs to accelerate the success of all payments companies and solve tomorrows payments challenges today We hire energetic and creative employees while providing them the opportunity to excel in their careers and make a difference for our clients Learn more about us and why we work here at httpswwwgalileoftcomworkingatgalileobrbrstrongThe rolebrbrstrongAs a data scientist at Galileo youll work closely with engineers building out our analytical platform to leverage our unique data sets to drive better outcomes for our clients and their customers As a longtime leader in the payments space Galileo has raw data that spans over more than 20 years to all aspects of payments including transactional card data payment dispute cases patterns of fraudulent activity and more Using cuttingedge tools on cloud platforms youll analyze these datasets and present your insights to internal users and to our clientsbrbrstronguWhat Youll DobrustrongulliContribute to the design orchestration and development of ongoing data science projects from data ingestion to presentationliliWork with platform engineers and others to develop toolsframeworks needed to carry out projectsliliSynthesize insights from raw data using a Pythonbased stack including pandas scikit and other toolsliliBuild new and improve existing models and test hypotheses in collaboration with machine learning engineers and othersliliBuild dashboards and other visualizations communicate findings internally and externallyliliValuesdriven approach to your role  SoFi and Galileo are values driven companies we look to work with others who are as well liliDesire to make a difference by extending and diversifying the reach of innovative payment solutions around the worldbrliulstronguWhat Youll NeedbrustrongulliBachelors Degree or higher in a quantitative field Computer Science Mathematics Machine Learning Operations Research Statistics etc or equivalent experienceliliExperience with the Python data science stack including pandas sklearn numpy and one or more charting librariesliliFluency in SQL for data queries liliFamiliarity with relational database designbrliulstronguNice To HavebrustrongulliExperience in building machine learning models ideally with the Python stack Pytorch TensorflowliliFamiliarity with Oracle SQL or AWS RDSRedshiftliliPrior exposure to the payments industry and familiarity with cardbased servicesliliFamiliarity with data science tooling in AWS including SageMaker S3 EC2 EMRbrliulstronguWhy Youll Love Working HerebrustrongulliCompetitive salary packages and bonusesliliComprehensive medical dental vision and life insurance benefitsliliGenerous vacation and holidaysliliPaid parental leave for eligible employeeslili401k and education on retirement planningliliTuition reimbursement on approved programsliliMonthly contribution up to 200 to help you pay off your student loansliliGreat health amp wellbeing benefits including telehealth parental support subsidized gym programliliFully stocked kitchen snacks and
